mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REPLY (RNO, BNO, REPLY, REPLYER) VALUES (SEQ_REPLY.NEXTVAL, #{bno}, #{reply}, #{replyer})
mapper.update: UPDATE REPLY SET REPLY = #{reply}, UPDATEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE RNO = #{rno}
mapper.select: SELECT RNO, BNO, REPLY, REPLYER, REPLYDATE, UPDATEDATE FROM REPLY WHERE BNO = #{bno} ORDER BY RNO ASC
